		Question: what type of art did leonardo da vinci make
		Answer:
answer:
Sure, here is the answer to the question:

Leonardo da Vinci made a variety of art, including painting, sculpting, drawing, architecture, engineering, heraldry, and cartography. Leonardo was a polymath, meaning that he excelled in many different fields of study. He was one of the greatest painters of all time, and his work has had a profound impact on Western art.
